  "customCode": "spark = self.spark_session
dbutils = get_ipython().user_ns["dbutils"]

import csv
import pandas as pd
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType

df_prod_skid_lkp = dict_all_dfs['df_prod_skid_lkp']["df_object"]

srce_sys_id = [<<SRCE_SYS_ID>>]
srce_sys_id1 = <<SRCE_SYS_ID>>
PROD_PRTTN_CODE = '<<PROD_PRTTN_CODE>>'
key_panel_prod = f'"TP_{(srce_sys_id1)}_PROD"'
key_panel_prod1 = f'"TP_EU_{(PROD_PRTTN_CODE)}"'

dbutils = get_ipython().user_ns["dbutils"]
import pyspark
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import *



from IPython import get_ipython
dbutils = get_ipython().user_ns["dbutils"]


df = spark.read.format("parquet").load("/mnt/refined/NNIT/tradepanel/prod-tp-lightrefined/MM_KEY_DOMAIN_DATA_PROVIDER")

for i in srce_sys_id:
  if i != 3:
    df_prod_skid = df.select("dimension_type_key","data_provider_key","object_type_key","key_domain_data_provider_code").filter("dimension_type_key == 8 and data_provider_key == 7 and key_domain_data_provider_code like 'TP_%_PROD'")
    df_prod_skid.createOrReplaceTempView("prod_skid")
    df_prod_skid = spark.sql(f'''select * from prod_skid where key_domain_data_provider_code = ({key_panel_prod})
                         ''')
  else:
    df_prod_skid = df.select("dimension_type_key","data_provider_key","object_type_key","key_domain_data_provider_code").filter("dimension_type_key == 8 and data_provider_key == 7 and key_domain_data_provider_code like 'TP_EU_%'")
    df_prod_skid.createOrReplaceTempView("prod_skid")
    df_prod_skid = spark.sql(f'''select * from prod_skid where key_domain_data_provider_code = ({key_panel_prod1})
                         ''')
						 
df_prod_skid = df_prod_skid.select("object_type_key").withColumn("srce_sys_id1", lit(srce_sys_id1).cast(IntegerType()))
    
df_prod_skid_lkp = df_prod_skid_lkp.join(df_prod_skid, df_prod_skid_lkp.srce_sys_id == df_prod_skid.srce_sys_id1, "Inner").drop("srce_sys_id1")

dict_all_dfs['df_prod_skid_lkp'] = {"df_object" :df_prod_skid_lkp}
df_output_dict['df_prod_skid_lkp'] = df_prod_skid_lkp
